Goop
The big problem with Dr Poison is that she's pretty reliant on hitting her leadership rolls and even when she does hit, the German Soldiers are pretty weak. I know 40 points isn't much but you are essentially just paying for a smoke cloud and maybe getting some poison off if you are lucky.
